## Podcast
  
#### The Forest Analytics Landing

 
<left>
![](/podcast_cover_small3.png){width=300px}

The [Forest Analytics Landing podcast](https://anchor.fm/matthew-russell95) highlighted current events, emerging research, and new opportunities in forest analytics. It provided commentary and shared stories about how organizations solved forestry problems by leveraging data to make informed decisions.
